header_text: You're slicing vegetables for a salad. Your fingers aren't working quite right, causing the knife to wobble. Your friend comments on your chopping technique, and them noticing your unsteady hands makes you embarrassed.

elements.name: You're slicing vegetables for a salad. Your fingers aren't working quite right, causing the knife to wobble. Your friend comments on your chopping technique, and them noticing your unsteady hands makes you embarrassed._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
